hypothesis_content.title: Multi-Catalyst Convergence: BOJ + ETF + Expiry
hypothesis_content.statement: When three catalysts align within 48 hours (BOJ policy shift + large options expiry + extreme ETF flows), and BTC holds above its 20-day MA throughout, the subsequent move will be amplified (6-8%) in the direction of the net catalyst bias, with 70% accuracy for NEUTRAL regimes.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Multiple catalysts in short timeframe create information overload and market confusion. NEUTRAL regimes lack strong directional bias, allowing catalyst convergence to break equilibrium. Holding above 20-day MA indicates underlying strength. Current setup has all three catalysts present.
entry_conditions: Catalyst 1: Major central bank surprise (BOJ hike)
Catalyst 3: Spot ETF flow magnitude >$200M (inflow or outflow)
BTC price > 20-day MA on daily close after third catalyst
Calculate net catalyst bias (bullish if: JPY weak + expiry call-heavy + ETF inflow)
Entry: Market order in direction of net bias at next daily open
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Three catalysts align but price moves <2% in either direction over 5 days, or moves opposite to net catalyst bias by >2%.
